SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Constants
This interface defines the key constants used throughout the application.
CRC
Utility class for calculating and verifying CRC (Cyclic Redundancy Check) values.
Data
Represents a wrapper for string data that can be converted to a byte array.
DataFile
Represents a file with its name and content, designed for serialization and cloning in network protocols.
FileDescriptor
Manages file-related operations for temporary and final file handling in the protocol.
FileManager
Manages the file-related state and directory settings for the protocol.
FragmentManager
Manages the state and operations of UDP fragments during transmission.
MessageDescriptor
Manages the assembly and storage of message fragments for a UDP protocol.
MyUDPProtocol
Represents a custom UDP protocol for transmitting data.
NetworkSetting
Handles network configurations for UDP communication, including local and peer settings.
ObjectToSend
Represents an object prepared for transmission in the UDP communication protocol.
P2P
The main class for the Peer-to-Peer (P2P) application.
ProtocolForCRC
Represents a protocol structure specifically designed for CRC (Cyclic Redundancy Check) calculations.
ProtocolForCRCWithoutData
Represents a protocol structure for CRC (Cyclic Redundancy Check) calculations without data or file content.
TypeOfMessage
Enum representing different types of messages in the UDP communication protocol.
Utils
Utility class providing helper methods for UDP communication.
